title: F1 2016 Round 06 - Monaco 720p50fps 6-Channel ENHANCED AUDIO
description:
This video is a RACE ONLY (no pre- or post-race footage), but with an additional audio track I call "Enhanced". Enhanced means the cars and ambient sounds have been boosted so you can actually hear them as well as the commentary (SkySports). For the past few years the commentators spend 75% of the time talking about tires. I'm convinced there was no valid reason for the FIA to introduce the two-compound tire rule other than to give the commentators something to talk about, and I want to hear the cars (even the turbo cars). The Natural Sounds (ambient) track provides that, but without ANY commentary, and there is some worthwhile content in the remaing 25% of the commentary. I think this soltuion is the best compromise. 

I've posted a few of my earlier efforts on KAT, but they aren't in the archives. However, this one is much better quality because it's 6-channel (5.1) AC3 rather than stereo. The volume imbalance between the standard SkySports track and the enhanced version matches much more closely. There's also the Natural Sounds track, which is not used in the creation of the enhanced track but I appreciate the uploader (who shall remain nameless) who provided it. 

I've enhanced the first part of the 2016 F1 season (thru Germany). If there is enough interest, I'll upload a few more. My Internet upload speed is pretty slow, so it takes a while to upload files of this size.

Enjoy!
